textBox.richText: Streams now available for direct download!/IAC,WAZ 9/29/08

Luckily, people controlling the achieve system have just revamped it, and now the public has access to all the mp3s, so you don't need mojo to download any of my old shows.  Also turns out they have an automatic XML for my show, but I'll keep posting weekly anyway, and include direct links to the shows from now on. Last Season: http://library.kdvs.org/archive/view/show_id/527 This Season: http://library.kdvs.org/archive/view/show_id/552 New show link: http://169.237.101.92/archives/2008-09-29_552_192kbps.mp3 New show is pretty much all currents.  I switched up the format this show, playing 3 or 4 tracks from each artist, instead of trying to switch artists every song.  I think this encourages people to check out the artist more after getting a decent sampling, and hopefully will help support underground goodness. Happy Listening
